remarks: If two point inversions commute, they are identical.  Theorem 7.19 of [Schwabhauser] p. 52.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mirval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
mirval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
mirval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
mirval.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
mirval.s $e |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) $.
mirval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
miduniq2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
miduniq2.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
miduniq2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. P ) $.
miduniq2.e $e |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` A ) ` ( ( S ` B ) ` X ) ) = ( ( S ` B ) ` ( ( S ` A ) ` X ) ) ) $.
miduniq2 $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
